description:
Osushi-chan is a puppy that Balgo found on the street and now cares for. Contrary to Osushi-chan`s cute appearance and gentle demeanor, the pup is actually a Disguiser (a dragon impersonating a puppy). If Balgo is in danger, or even sneezes or laughs too hard, Osushi-chan`s dragon wings will emerge.
Source: Official English Website
name: Osushi-chan
